structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Administration of KRS 198B.550 to 198B.630 -- Duties of commissioner.

text.section: The administration of KRS 198B.550 to 198B.630 is vested in the Department of Housing, Buildings and Construction.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 274, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 86, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984.
